item.title: Israeli Soldiers Fire Warning Shots to Disperse Western Diplomats Touring West Bank
item.description: The event in Jenin, in the Israeli-occupied West Bank, came amid rising tensions between Israel and its foreign partners.

item.title: How a Water Conservation Idea Won Over Oklahoma Farmers
item.description: Haunted by memories of the Dust Bowl, Oklahoma farmers have adopted conservation practices that have helped to revive about 100 streams.

item.title: Freddy Lim, Frontman of Chthonic, Is Taiwan’s New Envoy to Finland
item.description: Freddy Lim, the founder and lead singer of Chthonic, is well known in Finland, a heavy metal capital of the world.
